title: Stupid Fruit (Pls get rid of them)

replies.body: I think the addition of the fruit is great, the whole rng thing yes is quite based on luck, but that just makes every game more different and opens the door to a whole bunch of new mechanics and outplay potential that everyone has access to. I also think that having those baron or drag steals due to a lucky plant will also make the game more exciting. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

> [{quoted}](name=Retap,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=mkHb6XUh,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-09T05:28:36.059+0000)

> I think the addition of the fruit is great, the whole rng thing yes is quite based on luck, but that just makes every game more different and opens the door to a whole bunch of new mechanics and outplay potential that everyone has access to. I also think that having those baron or drag steals due to a lucky plant will also make the game more exciting. {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

it would make sense if SR was bigger like dotas map however since the map is super small i see no purpose of them, want to steal b or d? Flash or walk around, Need health? HPP, Need Vision? Ward ..

Its just Riot making a "effort" they even took away the buffs from the jungle farm like why would you do that!, 

Wolfs, Krugs, Gromp and Raptors all had buffs that helped and gave the junglers advantaged to gank and defend 

this. is. BS.

Riot clearly explained why they took the smite bonuses away.
They aren't used in the mid to late game, and if they are it's ONLY Birds.

Hell I'd have liked to use Gromp buff more often, but it's scaling wasn't that great and your smite is needed elsewhere.

I just think it's silly that someone like a vayne can now jump over a wall because of these fruit, where you would choose someone with mobility to do something like that, now it's built into the game, it can lead to a lot of unhealthy outcomes, winning a game because someone blasting a thing to put them on the other side of the wall to get a pick is just stupid. it's just my opinion, league is better without all this rng, Dragons were fine but this is just silly...

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Don't remove fruit.

#1. If you don't understand the basic mechanics of the game, you should not be playing ranked PERIOD.
#2. These are a great mechanic, Just learn to use them and its GG.

Just play a tank jungler, gank the side lanes and abuse the honeyfruit. Or a cinderhulk top laner. Push in your laner hard to deny them cs, gank mid, then go get your health back in the river.

I think the ziggs satchel charge one helps a little (e.g. running from a red buff steal).

Fruit is corny, but give it time.

I enjoy them, it feels like they fit the map well & it'll take some time to get used to the chances which they bring to the table. Popping them so they won't be around for other people if you have escapes & everything else is an option too.
I feel that we need different type of plants and more consistency because I feel that in it's current form, plants are alot less competitively flexible than smite buffs were.

While i agree that fruit are worse then RNG in low elo, where people don't understand them, in higher elo they aren't a terrible addition, as you can play around the spawn timers, and know when/where fruit are likely to be to squash them before an objective.

"RPGs shouldn't have RNG!" more of this bullshit eh.

Stop parroting the crap you see on youtube and reddit, the plants are not RNG, they have set timers and set locations to spawn in.
Having a 30 second window in which they can spawn DOES NOT MAKE THEM RNG.
The fruit spawn in set locations, you'll never see a vision fruit where an exploding fruit spawns. So again no RNG here.

There is absolutely nothing RNG here.

i dont think that healing fruit is a great idea. it just make me thinking that function would destroy this game. i think the fixed place for this fruit, and stronger reducing the healing result or increasing the time for refreshing this fruit. but the best way is to remove this function.
